        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>7880</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Clay Quiz</string>
            <string language="es">Cuestionario sobre arcilla</string>
            <string language="ga">Tráth na gCeist faoi Chré</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehm-Quiz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu d'Argile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quiz Da Argila</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quiz Dell'Argilla</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαγωνισμός γνώσεων αργίλου</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Children will appreciate the importance of working with clay correctly.</string>
            <string language="es">Los niños apreciarán la importancia de trabajar con arcilla correctamente.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tuigfidh na leanaí an tábhacht a bhaineann le bheith ag obair le cré i gceart.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Visual Arts</string>
            <string language="es">Artes visuales</string>
            <string language="ga">Amharcealaíona</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kinder schätzen den Wert von mit Lehm richtig 
arbeiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les enfants apprécieront l'importance de 
travailler avec de l'argile correctement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As crianças apreciarão a importância de 
trabalhar com argila corretamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I bambini apprezzeranno l'importanza di 
funzionamento con l'argilla correttamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα παιδιά θα εκτιμήσουν τη σημασία με τον άργιλο 
σωστά.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sichtkünste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts Visuels</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικαστηκές τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
